attributes.action: Allow the singing of an English Anthem at major sporting events, when an ENGLISH team is playing rather than the National Anthem.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When Sportsmen who play for an ENGLAND team play in competitions against other Countries, who form part of the United Kingdom, in sporting events eg Football, Rugby etc. The other teams have their own Anthem ie Rose of Scotland, Land of my Fathers etc. England teams have the NATIONAL Anthem. We should be allowed our own identity and sing either Jerusalem or land of Hope and Glory.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
